Class ResponseEntityServerFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.filter.OncePerRequestHttpServerFilter
      • io.micronaut.spring.web.ResponseEntityServerFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ordered, HttpFilter, HttpServerFilter

    @Filter(value="/**")
public class ResponseEntityServerFilter
extends OncePerRequestHttpServerFilter
    A filter that adds support for ResponseEntity as a return type.
